response.overview: A down-on-his-luck PI is hired by his old flame to investigate a murder. But while the case at first appears routine, it slowly reveals itself to be a complex interwoven web of crimes, suspects and dead bodies.
response.tagline: A Private Eye. A Public Murder. A Perfect Crime.
response.title: The Poison Rose

results.name: THE POISON ROSE - In Select Theaters and On Demand May 24!
